10.1038/s42256-022-00506-3: Integrated quantum chemistry calculations, machine learning predictive models, and reinforcement learning to find new molecules for battery applications.
10.1016/j.patter.2021.100361: Demonstrates the importance of data curation over model connectivity predicting the stability of inorganic materials. Highlighted in a research preview.
10.1016/j.joule.2019.05.011: Used metabolic modeling to find reaction knockouts to dramatically improve muconate yields. Has opened up continued improvement in productivity, substrate usage, and muconate-derived products.
10.1038/s41467-020-16201-z: Developed an interactive web app to serve predictions from an ML model trained on quantum-chemistry calculations.
10.1126/science.1223710: Built a mathematical model that clarified the role of a key protein in mammalian circadian rhythms.
10.1016/j.combustflame.2017.12.005: Developed a group-contribution model and built a web application for the prediction of sooting tendency. Available at https://ysi.ml.nrel.gov/
10.1063/1.5099132: Our first application of graph neural networks for chemical structure prediction, applied to predicting optoelectronic properties of organic photovoltaics.
10.1371/journal.pcbi.1007424: A probablistic programming framework for integrating multiomics measurements with biological prior knowledge. Part of the Agile BioFoundry's Learn effort.
